prompt_text:
Content Title Creation Brief
Objective: craft 5 link-ready titles for https://www.platincasino.es/promociones-casino that feel at home on eldiariodearteixo.com.

Reference SERP keyword: casino
Anchor keyword (use only if natural): bonos de bienvenida sin deposito

Anchor operates in: Unspecified

Reference titles:
- Best Casino Games Online in Australia
- Best Live Dealer Casino in Canada
- Presentación del libro "Atlas sensorial dunha Costa da ...
- Nace a Escola de Regueifa de Carballo
- Poesía y teatro, vida y palabras
- "Juguetes que unen"
- Desbloquear el Bono de Bienvenida 1Win: Guía sencilla ...
- BOE: medidas hacia la fase 3
- One, two, three… Action !!, un nuevo espacio lúdico para ...

Guidance:
1. Combine your own knowledge of eldiariodearteixo.com's catalog with the SERP references to surface authentic angles.
2. Make every title feel native to eldiariodearteixo.com while naturally justifying a link to https://www.platincasino.es/promociones-casino.
3. Use the anchor text only when it reads naturally inside supporting copy, never inside the title.
4. Titles must exclude bonos de bienvenida sin deposito and any casino/operator brand names entirely; reserve brand mentions for rationales.
5. If extra notes or your knowledge indicate a placement locale, tailor the titles accordingly; otherwise keep them globally applicable while acknowledging Unspecified where useful.
6. Incorporate any extra campaign notes: .
7. Keep every title free of review or promo phrasing (e.g., avoid 'review', 'bonus', 'promo code').

Examples:
- Bad: "Casiny online casino review" (violates brand + review rule).
- Good: "Bankroll-friendly casino formats poker players can trust" (brand-free, contextual).

Return JSON exactly as {"titles": [{"title": "...", "rationale": "..."}]} with 5 items.
